entry.title: Website: make google search your website
entry.content: Let the google search on the navigation bar work. Submitt your url to google on this website https://www.google.com/webmasters/tools/submit-url.

entry.title: Redirect personal website to here
entry.content:
my old personal website is stat.ubc.ca/~yunlong.nie and when visitors come to this web page, I’d like to guide them to this new blog automatically.

Here we need to make use .haccess file.

      $ cd public_html/
      $ vi .haccess
      # put the following code into this file
      Redirect 301 /~yunlong.nie/ http://yunlongnie.github.io/

Bingo! This website has more details.
